docs.title: Kaijie Yin（殷凯捷）
docs.text:
Personal page of Kaijie Yin

Email: kaijieyin@foxmail.com, MC35211@um.edu.mo

docs.title: Bio
docs.text:
I will be attending the University of Macau in August 2023 to pursue a Master's degree in Robotics and Autonomous Systems.

Prior to that, I received my Bachelor of Engineering degree from the School of Computer Science, Hangzhou Dianzi University in June 2023, under the supervision of Professor Jia Gangyong. During my undergraduate studies, I spent close to two semesters of research training in the university's cloud computing lab, experimenting with x86 kernel demo implementation and Linux file system research.

My Bachelor's thesis is a study of Mobile Ad Hoc Networks for UAV Clusters. During my studies, I learned about the interest in multi-intelligent systems. Its research ideology can solve problems that cannot be solved by traditional methods or provide a better solution to some problems like UAV clusters, or even social networks.

In the future, I hope to conduct further research on multi-agent systems.

Here is my Curriculum Vitae.

docs.title: Research Interest
docs.text: Cooperative Control of Mobile Robots, Agent-Based Model, Deep Reinforcement Learning
